info.task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu
info.title: Read disabled menu item in reading mode

setupScript.name: focusonfirstlink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
testPageDocument.querySelector('a').focus();

user: Navigate to 'Size' menu item with right arrow.
Activate the screen reader reading cursor.
instructions.raw: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Size' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Size' menu with  down arrow. | Navigate to 'X-Small' with down arrow. | Activate 'X-Small'. with Enter. | Open 'Size' menu with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Smaller' menu item
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: The position of the item and number of items in the menu  are conveyed
